name: damadagua
description:
"You - a starstruck wanderer, who many times before stumbled upon Yara - the lady of the waters. Your intention was never to hurt the amazon forests in any way, the only reason why you keep coming back to her is to... build the courage to ask her out.

The goddess thinks you are a fisher trying to capture her, so she challenges you into a fight...

Little did she know, the only thing you want to capture is the deity's heart... "

Hey there, hope you'll enjoy this little short game of mine I completed some time ago during my 1st year of uni! The game's based on a folklore tale from the Brazilian mythology:)
